entry.title: sh13y/Musixmatch: This project is a lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Musixmatch API, making it super easy to fetch lyrics, track info, and artist details. Perfect for music apps, Discord bots, or settling lyric-based arguments with friends.

entry.title: budysutjijati/suiteproxy: Suiteproxy is a lightweight proxy server designed to securely relay API requests to a NetSuite RESTlet URL. By acting as an intermediary, it protects your NetSuite account credentials and ensures enhanced control, including customizable rate limiting features, IP restrictions, and additional security measures.
entry.content: Suiteproxy is a lightweight proxy server designed to securely relay API requests to a NetSuite RESTlet URL. By acting as an intermediary, it protects your NetSuite account credentials and ensures enhanced control, including customizable rate limiting features, IP restrictions, and additional security measures.
